Lyric:
[by:净寐]
[ti:Lush Life]
[ar:Zara Larsson]
[al:]
[by:Sxul]
[00:09.26] I live my day as if it was the last
[00:11.75] Live my day as if there was no past
[00:14.04] Doin' it all nite, all summer
[00:16.53] Doin' it the way I wanna

[00:19.17] Yeah I’mma dance my heart out ’til the dawn
[00:21.75] But I won’t be done when morning comes
[00:24.04] Doin' it all nite, all summer
[00:26.28] Gonna spend it like no other
 
[00:30.21] It was a crush
[00:32.00] But I couldn’t, couldn’t get enough
[00:35.06] It was a rush
[00:36.70] But I gave it up

[00:39.97] It was a crush
[00:41.61] Now I might have went and said too much
[00:44.45] But that’s all it was
[00:46.59] So I gave it up

[00:48.48] I live my day as if it was the last

[01:18.98] No tricks, no bluff
[01:20.69] I’m just better off without them cuffs
[01:23.27] Yeah the sun won’t set on us

[01:29.20] Went low, went high
[01:31.34] Still waters run dry
[01:33.92] Gotta get back in the groove
[01:36.81] I ain’t ever worry

[01:38.90] Went low, went high
[01:41.06] What matters is now
[01:44.10] Getting right back in the mood

[01:49.57] Live my day as if there was no past

[02:01.56] Doin' it all nite, all summer

[02:14.65] Second time is one too late
